patthana12.13:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana12.13:1.1_0: Not knowing and seeing what’s given up.
patthana12.13:1.1_4: By doing so, they don’t give up wrong thought. ...
patthana12.13:1.1_5: It shouldn’t be given up by means of a transmigration. ...
patthana12.13:1.1_6: Not developing the mind, they should not give up covetousness.
patthana12.13:1.1_7: You shouldn’t give up development of the teaching.
patthana12.13:10.1_0: You don’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
patthana12.13:10.1_1: You don’t speak of the supreme Dhamma.
patthana12.13:11.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of refuge.
patthana12.13:12.1_0: Nor causes the reason for the sake of contemplation.
patthana12.13:12.1_1: Nor causes the reason for the sake of conflict.
patthana12.13:12.1_2: Nor do they arise for the sake of cause or reason.
patthana12.13:13.1_0: Nor do they give rise to confidence in the teaching ...
patthana12.13:14.1_0: (These five discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
patthana12.13:15.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge to the teaching, not for the sake of refuge.
patthana12.13:16.1_0: Nor is a cause or reason.
patthana12.13:17.1_0: (These two discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
patthana12.13:2.1_0: for the sake of letting go, two results, together with the five results of deeds ...
patthana12.13:3.1_0: You don’t speak of thought because of thought. ...
patthana12.13:3.1_1: You don’t give rise to thought. ...
patthana12.13:3.1_10: It’s not easy to completely understand the teaching of the noble ones.
patthana12.13:3.1_11: it doesn’t lead to the persuasion of views.
patthana12.13:3.1_4: They don’t give rise to satisfaction ...
patthana12.13:3.1_5: she doesn’t give rise to thought of yellow ...
patthana12.13:3.1_6: They don’t give rise to confidence in some things.
patthana12.13:3.1_7: you don’t give rise to confidence in some things.
patthana12.13:3.1_9: Avoiding pleasure and pain dependent on the principle.
patthana12.13:5.1_1: You don’t try to kill living creatures.
patthana12.13:5.1_2: You don’t try to kill living creatures ...
patthana12.13:5.1_3: You don’t provide the principle for the sake of a teacher.
patthana12.13:7.1_0: Nor do they long for the sake of formlessness ...
patthana12.13:7.1_1: you don’t try to kill living creatures.
patthana12.13:8.1_0: Not seeing the teaching of the noble ones ...
patthana12.13:8.1_1: for the sake of streaming radiance.
patthana12.13:9.1_1: Because of not hearing the teaching,
patthana12.13:9.1_2: not for the sake of health ...
patthana12.13:9.1_3: for the sake of not debate.
